    • getContentString

      public String getContentString()
      Gets the string representation of the tower. 'w' - simple white piece 'W' - king white piece 'b' - simple black piece 'B' - king black piece for example "WbbBwwB"
      Returns:
      a String: representation of the contents of the tower
